text: Lee Weaver (born April 10, 1930) is an American movie and television actor. He is known for his role in O Brother, Where Art Thou?. He also appeared in The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air. Weaver was born on April 10, 1930 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. He has been married to Ta-Tanisha since 1971. They have one child. Weaver now lives in The Bronx, New York. ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Fort Lauderdale, Florida
title: Lee Weaver
